content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Staffing\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please refer to PAL for \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pal.epam.com/pal_method_plugin/guidances/supportingmaterials/ResourceManager_F2133899.html?nodeId=35590641\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Resource Manager\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The duties of the Resource Manager in the Staffing process include but not limited to:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Monitor your resources billable workload. Note resources that are being rolled off the project soon (2 weeks minimum). Confirm resource availability with respective project owners (DM/AM). Engage with such resources immediately to discuss further steps. Plan on providing project feedback and career development recommendations.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Offer available resources from your team to the positions. Consider Employees' availability for Travel & Relocation based on their preferences in UPSA profile when searching for potential opportunities.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Introduce resources that you are unable to staff immediately to the Bench Management if they have good performance review and good feedback from previous projects. When introducing an employee to the Bench Management provide all important information about employee's professional qualities, feedback from previous projects, locational preferences, if known along with recommendations for the best fit role.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Monitor bench time for your Employees. During their time on bench, meet with them regularly to review potential opportunities and ensure they are kept engaged in a meaningful way (e.g. training, internal projects, CSR or taking time off). If no opportunities are found within reasonable timeframe, discuss with your Manager, People Management Lead and Bench manager to understand if there is a need to consider termination of employment.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Note: It's recommended to search for people for a project using internal resources (Bench, Resource Development Laboratories, \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://staffing.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Staffing Desk\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") before searching/hiring for people from outside of EPAM.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/RD/EPAM+RD+Space+Home\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Resource Development (RD) Laboratories\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - is a corporate shared service aimed at providing the GDO, IBU, CBU & Geography units with juniors/specialists (L1/L2 level) in accordance with the Company/business growth plan.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The RD process is operating in four countries (BY, RU, UA, KZ).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please refer your questions on how to use the service directly to your local RD managers. Responsible managers can be found here - \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://upsa.epam.com/workload/orgchart.do?unitId=4000741400002840776\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"UPSA org structure\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In any other cases, please follow the next steps:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cc794bb9-2685-4727-99e3-6bbdfd83c485/staf1.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":759,\"height\":63}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You have two options to find open positions:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"via \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://radar.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Staffing Radar\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" tool (follow the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMSRDR/Resource+Manager\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"instructions\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"); or\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"via Telescope tool in the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/search/positions\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Positions\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" search. This is a better option when you need to find position with specific skill set which may be mentioned in position description. Start to type needed skill in the search field then use filters on the left to narrow options.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When you find the Position in one of the tools above and follow the link, you will be redirected to the major staffing tool – \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://staffing.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Staffing Desk\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" where you can find more details on the position (please see more details in the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMSTAFPUB/Resource+manager+role\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"role based user guide\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\").\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Note: the candidates are required for positions both in 'Open' and 'In Progress' statuses. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you see the positions in 'Proposed' status, it is better to contact Key Staff of the project / opportunity to make sure they need more candidates or not.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can contact a \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Staffing Coordinator\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" of the corresponding competency/skill regarding open positions and check whether your team members match the requirements. Please find the list of dedicated Staffing Coordinators \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMWPM/Dedicated+Skill+Staffing+Coordinators\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/29f48aa8-e631-4937-afa6-b9e556cb5890/staf2.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":759,\"height\":62}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you see that your bench Employee can be proposed to a position, contact the PM/DM/AM or Staffing Coordinator (if one is mentioned) of the position to discuss it or get more details regarding position the same time, make sure that the Employee's profile in UPSA is up to date and ready to be exported for Customer review.
